hero.title: World-Class Caravans & Mobile Building Solutions
hero.subtitle: Over 10 years of experience delivering the best innovative solutions for caravans, prefabricated buildings, and customized containers.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.description: Established in 2016 with the goal of delivering mobile solutions that meet the highest standards of quality and innovation. We rely on cutting-edge manufacturing technologies (CAD / CAE / CAM) to deliver strong, efficient, and client-ready products across various sectors.
aboutSection.visionText: To lead the future of smart mobile solutions.
aboutSection.missionText: To design and deliver innovative solutions that exceed customer expectations.

contactSection.title: Contact Us
contactSection.subtitle: We're here to help! Contact us today for a free consultation or a customized quote tailored to your needs.
contactSection.formPrompt: Or fill out the quick form, and we'll get back to you shortly!
